name: Cannon Fire
description:
Cannon fire is a game all about blowing your friends' ship to pieces, in Multiplayer or Split-Screen mode for the best experience. The game uses a low poly artistic style to capture an almost Caribbean setting. The game has different types of ships witch all vary in size, damage, health, and speed.

Ship types currently in the game:
  • Galion
  • Warship
  • RPG jetski

Multiplayer now available!
